scripts.clean: rm -r dist dist-tools dist-test utils build schemas 2> /dev/null; rm *.d.ts 2> /dev/null; rm *.js 2> /dev/null
scripts.buildForNpm: npm run addVersion ; npm run compileTs && npm run arrangeForNpm
scripts.buildForBrowser: npm run addVersion ; npm run compileTs && webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.dev.js && webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.startExampleServer: npm run buildForBrowser && cp ./build/* ./example-server/app/dist && node example-server/app/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean 2> /dev/null; npm run build:test && mocha -r jsdom-global/register --exit 'dist-test/test/**/*.test.js' && cp build/gb-tracker-client-* test-integration/apps/sites && npm run addVersionJs && mocha test-integration/index.spec.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run clean 2> /dev/null; npm run buildForNpm
scripts.test:integration: npm run clean 2> /dev/null; npm run buildForBrowser; cp build/gb-tracker-client-*.js test-integration/apps/site/gb-tracker-client.js && mocha test-integration/index.spec.js
